name: WASHINGTON TAX & PUBLIC POLICY GROUP ON BEHALF OF LEGGETT & PLATT, INC.
sampleDescriptions: Trade issues related to manufacturing, duty circumvention, and steel trade. Tax policy issues, including interest expense limitation and R&D amortization.
